item.description:
Lets all go to Yankee Lanes For Some Comedy! Tickets are only $10.

 

Please arrive at 7pm so we can all meetup, sit together and have appetizers before the comedy show.

 

The Comedians that will be performing are two of my very good friends...they are both amazing performers and the funniest comedians around! Your going to love them!

Please read below on Andrea Henry and Dennis Fogg.

Also, I will be performing too! I hope you can all make it...It's going to be a great show.

***************************************************************************************************

Andrea Henry is one of Boston's favorite comics! She was the third place winner of Nickelodeons Search for America's Funniest mom. She has been on Comedy Central and one of the opening acts on Last Comic Standing Tour.

***************************************************************************************************

Dennis Fogg is the first to admit that his comedic talent is medicine for the soul. But what inspires him most when making his audience laugh, is that his wittiness is a gift from god. As a native Mainer, Dennis began making people laugh while waiting in line at the grocery store. Dennis Believed, if he could make people laugh through every day encounters, he could possibly make people laugh on stage. Dennis proceeded with his mission to do just that, pursue his passion for comedy profeesionally and with great excellence. Dennis Fogg's professional career began by doing stand up comedy at countless Comedy Connection's showcase spots: however, he did not limit himself to the Connection. He started captivating audiences on numerous college campuses from SMCC, USM and many others. It didn't take long for his talent to be nationally known. Dennis's uncanny ability to make people laugh is unbelievable, and his comic timing is unstoppable. His audience is very diverse (anyone that has a gut to bust).

********************************************************************************************************

Tammy Pooler: After taking two years off from performing standup comedy...it will be nice to get back on the stage and perfom for everyone!

Information-Pooler has been identified by Portland Phoenic as "Portland's Best Comedic Artist" and has worked in all types of venues, from the Maine Mall in South Portland to clubs, colleges, theaters and country clubs all over New England. With more than 10 years experience customers can't help but bust out laughing while watching Tammy work her comedy talent on stage. Her innocnet apprearance is belied by an edge sense of humor.
item.how_to_find_us: I will meet everyone inside Yankee Lane in the City Sports Grille
item.name: Appetizers & Comedy Night @ Yankee Lanes Portland in the City Sports Grille
